Node Desc: Basic information, status information, scheduling information of nodes.
Fault Desc: System detects faults in nodes, GPUs, network cards, hard drives, etc., and performs automatic repairs, as well as recording offline operations and maintenance.
Xid Desc: Error codes are error reports from the graphics card driver that are printed to the operating system's kernel log or event log. Error codes indicate that a general error has occurred with the graphics card, most commonly due to incorrect programming of the card by the driver or corrupted commands sent to the card. These messages may indicate a hardware problem, a graphics card problem, or a user application problem.
